title: Tenanted 3 Bedroom Furnished Apartment @ On320 for Sale
details:
If you are looking for a fixed income till year 2021,here is a great opportunity to buy a spaciously furnished 3 bedroom apartment on a higher floor[above the 10th] @ On320 with a monthly rental income of USD 1,800/- with a 10% annual increment.

Quoted Selling Price : LKR 53 Million [Negotiable]

NO BROKERS/AGENTS PLEASE
